game.name: Alisa’s  Incident Report
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nursing student Alisa takes on a part-time job ghosts to pay for tuition. By glimpsing the ghost’s past memories and providing compassionate nursing care, help them rest in peace! A medical and occult RPG made by a REAL NURSE!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nursing student Alisa takes on a part-time job ghosts to pay for tuition. By glimpsing the ghost’s past memories and providing compassionate nursing care, help them rest in peace! A medical and occult RPG made by a REAL NURSE!
